pages.text: In TerraFirmaCraft World it is not so easy to create a $(l:mechanics/steel)Steel Ingot$(). Now you have to follow full process of forging the ingots from $(thing)Pig Iron$() to $(thing)Steel$(). Luckily, this process can be simplified later.
